mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM (ROOMNUM, USER1, USER2) VALUES (NULL, #{user1}, #{user2})
INSERT INTO CHAT (CHATNUM, ROOMNUM, SENDER, RECEIVER, MESSAGE, CHATDATE) VALUES (NULL, #{roomNum}, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{message}, #{chatDate})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CHATNUM, C.ROOMNUM, C.SENDER, E.NAME, C.RECEIVER, C.MESSAGE, left(C.CHATDATE,16) AS CHATDATE FROM CHAT C JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON (C.SENDER = E.EMPLOYEENUM) WHERE C.ROOMNUM = #{roomNum} ORDER BY C.CHATNUM ASC
